attributes.action: Discontinue any further broadcasts/performances of "Austin Powers" film they are degrading in their honesty.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Discontinue any firther broadcasts/performances of "Austin Powers" film they are degrading in their honesty. The teeth, the chest hair etc. the Americans are just having a laugh I know but I find it degrading myself.
We do not all look like Peter and Gordon

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
